Definition: Includes technology name (Battery Storage or Pump Storage) and storage hours.

Technology code: {CountryCode}ELPT{StorageHours} for battery storage and {CountryCode}. 
ELPTPS for pump storage.
Storage hours offered by the techniology.
Ratio of energy output by the system to the energy input to the system.

Technology code: SS_{CountryCode}{StorageTechnologyCode}. 
Storage technology code is ELPT for battery storage and ELPTPS for pump storage.
Named as SS01, SS02, and so on based on storage technologies available in the country.
Named as PC01, PC02, and so on based on storage technologies available in the country.
Named as PS01, PS02, and so on based on storage technologies available in the country.
